bibl.title: Which Ptolemy gave Troops and stood as Protector of Pyrrhus' Kingdom?
bibl.note: The balance of probability is in favour of Pyrrhus having received the large military force mentioned in Justin 17.2.14 not from Ptolemy Ceraunus but from Ptolemy II Philadelphus.
